docs.snippet: In what he said would be his final news conference as N.B.A. commissioner, Stern said the ultimate aim was to have a European division with perhaps five teams in major cities like London, Berlin and Paris....

headline.main: A Finale of Sorts for David Stern, Who Predicts a More Global N.B.A.

docs.snippet: Fashions fade, controversy and celebrities are eternal. This mantra was on full display at Friday's fall-winter 2014 menswear shows in Paris — with Will Smith at Maison Martin Margiela, rapper Kanye West hobnobbing at Givenchy and a prominen...
docs.lead_paragraph: Fashions fade, controversy and celebrities are eternal. This mantra was on full display at Friday's fall-winter 2014 menswear shows in Paris — with Will Smith at Maison Martin Margiela, rapper Kanye West hobnobbing at Givenchy and a prominent fashionista causing a stir because she wore a real gorilla fur coat.

headline.main: PARIS MENSWEAR: Kanye West, Gorilla Fur Hit Paris
headline.print_headline: PARIS MENSWEAR: Kanye West, Gorilla Fur Hit Paris

docs.snippet: At the University of Texas, football is religion. At Penn State University, they need football for redemption. So when these storied programs hired black head coaches within days of each other to return them to past glory, it was a major moment fo...
docs.lead_paragraph: At the University of Texas, football is religion. At Penn State University, they need football for redemption. So when these storied programs hired black head coaches within days of each other to return them to past glory, it was a major moment for a sport that has been among the slowest to promote African-American leaders at the highest level.

headline.main: 'Historic' Black Coach Hires at Texas, Penn State
headline.print_headline: 'Historic' Black Coach Hires at Texas, Penn State
